spec_data.Name: relevation
spec_data.Description:
Relevation is a tool to retrieve passwords stored in a password file in the
format used by Revelation, from the command-line instead of through a GUI.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 29 Jul 2017 09:01:08 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Command-line search for Revelation Password Manager files
